name: gxkb
body:
### Description
It shows a flag of current keyboard in a systray area and allows you to switch to another one. It's written in C and uses the GTK library (no GNOME is needed)

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with gxkb? Please send bug report to the [GitHub Issue Tracker](https://github.com/zen-tools/gxkb/issues). Feel free to use this issue tracker to contact @zen-tools with questions and comments.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
